item.description:
I've covered it with kitchen roll

item.title: Stelling Road 30 - 40, 2nd October
item.description:
The street needs cleaning outside of the shops on Londonderry Parade. This is due to the flats' bins' being overfilled and is happening on a regular basis. Please can the area be swept asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stelling Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken branch dangling over street, 2nd October
item.description:
Tree is in bird sanctuary but could be accessed from Walden Road to remove this broken branch. Branch could potentially fall on pedestrians or parked vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: No shop front licence on display in window (as per the terms), 2nd October
item.description:
Failure to display in window a valid shop fronts licence is a breach of the terms for that licence. Please enforce to display valid licence. Cafe at 69 Mare St, London E8 4RG places tables and chairs on public pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees overgrowing on properties roofs and on pavements, 2nd October
item.description:
Lady Dock Path, close to Street light 18, trees have not been looked after by the Council. They are covering part of the roofs of properties but also, branches are getting low and it is dangerous for pedestrians and cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lady Dock Path, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped carpet material, 2nd October
item.description:
Several sections of carpet underlay have been dumped here, they haven't been disposed of for weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Approach Road, New Barnet, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees covering street lights - danger for bus users to walk on pavements, 2nd October
item.description:
Trees are covering the street lights so much that there is no light to walk safely on pavements when getting off from buses on Salter Road. Street lights should be clear from leave and branches obstacles. Also, bushes should be cut when overgrowing onto pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Salter Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: A Illegal Parking problem has been found, 2nd October

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kenninghall Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Car appears to have been abandoned on Felmingham Road, 2nd October
item.description:
The car has remained untouched since at least 18th September, and potentially longer. It is parked opposite Stewart Fleming school at the top of Felmingham Road. It is parked as if left there in a rush, although I appreciate this a personal perspective. There was a also a dent in the rear of the car, which was there when the car was first parked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Felmingham Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light 18 not working from April 2025 (at least), 2nd October
item.description:
Lady Dock path, street light no 18 not working - never been replaced since April- reported by someone else months ago but no action.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lady Dock Path, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light turned the wrong way, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: Tree canopy impacting pathway, 2nd October
item.description:
